Simple, Transparent Pricing

Choose the package that fits your daycare's needs and budget. No hidden fees, no surprises—just clear deliverables and fast turnaround.

Starter

Perfect for Getting Started

$1,497one-time
2-3 weeks turnaround

Essential digital presence upgrade to help your daycare get discovered online.

  • Google Business Profile optimization
  • NAP citation audit & cleanup (top 10 directories)
  • Basic brand refresh (color palette, font selection)
  • Simple logo update or enhancement
  • 4-page website on Wix or WordPress (Home, About, Programs, Contact)
  • Mobile-responsive design
  • Contact form integration
  • Google Analytics setup
  • Basic SEO optimization
  • 1 round of revisions
Most Popular

Growth

Most Popular for Growing Daycares

$2,997one-time
4-5 weeks turnaround

Complete digital transformation to help fill seats and build trust with parents.

  • Everything in Starter, plus:
  • Google Business Profile full optimization + strategic posting plan
  • NAP citation building (30+ directories)
  • Complete brand kit (logo, colors, fonts, usage guide)
  • Social media templates (10 customizable Canva templates)
  • 6-page professional website with custom design
  • Online booking integration (Calendly or embedded form)
  • Automated review request system setup
  • Parent testimonial collection & display
  • Photo gallery setup (using your photos)
  • Enhanced SEO with keyword research
  • Google Search Console setup
  • 2 rounds of revisions
  • 30-day post-launch support

Premium

Complete Digital Excellence

$4,997one-time
6-8 weeks turnaround

White-glove service with custom branding, professional content, and ongoing optimization.

  • Everything in Growth, plus:
  • Custom brand strategy & identity design
  • Professional on-site photography (half-day session)
  • 8-page custom website with premium features
  • Advanced booking system with waitlist management
  • CRM integration for lead nurturing
  • Parent portal setup (resources, calendars, updates)
  • Video integration (virtual tour, testimonials)
  • Advanced review generation & reputation management
  • Competitor analysis & market positioning
  • Local SEO domination (50+ citations, schema markup)
  • Monthly analytics reporting (first 3 months)
  • Social media content calendar (first month)
  • 3 rounds of revisions
  • 90-day priority support

What's Included in Every Package

Deliverables

  • •Complete audit of current digital presence
  • •Detailed revamp strategy & timeline
  • •All source files & brand assets
  • •Training on how to maintain & update
  • •Documentation & best practices guide

Our Process

  • 1.Free consultation & needs assessment
  • 2.Kickoff call & information gathering
  • 3.Design & development with regular updates
  • 4.Review & revision rounds
  • 5.Launch, training, & ongoing support
